column4: Hello all. Does anyone know where I can find the repository URL's for 11.04 so that I can copy and paste them into /etc/apt/sources.list?
Thanks but that does no longer have 11.04
it looks like natty is still in http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/ so, as long as you use the official repos, you can replace the dist with natty and it should work
That's exactly what I've just done :) Thanks
you should probably upgrade, natty is at end of life as of last week.
